moves.1. e4: an exercise to evade boredom.  Below par players are often dangerous to tango, but this guy did everything wrong...
moves.13. Bxc6: finally, he axes the knight which he could have done eons ago....
moves.14. dxe5 dxe5: surely, to get the queens out altogether, will it work?
moves.15. Qxd8+ Rxd8: yep, staying put on this line, and if need be, move my king tip toe style...
moves.16... a6 17. Nc4: cant go for the horse now, else i scramble these efforts...
moves.17... Rg8: pushing my luck, he ought to scramble for cover...
moves.18. Re1: but he does not, least anticipating what follows!
moves.23. Kxg1 Rxe1+: the rest is text bk stuff!
